content: triangle shawl no 1 by justine & cleo malone yarn abbreviations 420 yards of worsted weight yarn k / knit kfb / knit front back needles m / marker us 8 / 5 mm 32 40 circular needles pm / place marker sm / slip marker notions 1 stitch marker pattern 1 cast on 9 stitches gauge 2 knit one row 5 stitches & 9 row per inch 3 k 2 kfb twice pm kfb twice k 3 13 in garter stitch before blocking sts total 4 ws knit one row measurements 5 rs k 2 kfb k to 1 st before m kfb 41 across & 19 tall sm kfb k to last 4 sts kfb k 3 4 sts increased tip place a locking marker on the right 6 repeat steps 4 & 5 until shawl side of your work to easily tell when to measures 19 tall or desired size work the increase row 7 bind off all stitches weave in ends
